Header: Commander Extends Best Wishes to Retiring Two RSMs
Content: Continuing the newly-established practice of appreciating the services of Regimental Sergeant Majors (RSMs) who are about to go on retirement after serving the Army, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake, Commander of the Army this morning (6) met two more RSMs including a woman RSM at his office and presented them with appreciative certificates. During the brief meeting, the Commander inquired into their sea of experiences and how the future would hold for them after retirement. After extending his warm wishes, the Commander presented both of them with certificates of appreciation. Major General Devinda Perera, Director General Personnel Administration and the RSM at the Army Headquarters Battalion were present during the brief meet at the Army Headquarters.
